root.name: T'ai Fu: Wrath of the Tiger
root.description: The ClansThis mystical land of ancient China that the game is set in is populated by extended families of animals known as clans. Each clan harnesses their own contribution to the styles of the art of kung-fu. They live in harmony, and each clan grants respect for the wisdom and skill of the others.Dragon ClanSnake ClanMantis ClanLeopard ClanMonkey ClanCrane ClanPanda ClanBoar ClanRat ClanTiger Clan
